edu.harvard.util.gui

Class GraphDisplay<N extends Node<N,E>,E extends Edge<N>,S extends SummaryNode<N,E,S,G>,G extends Graph<N,E,S,G>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.harvard.util.gui.GraphDisplay<N,E,S,G>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the node type
    E - the edge type
    S - the summary node type
    G - the graph type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GraphDisplay<N extends Node<N,E>,E extends Edge<N>,S extends SummaryNode<N,E,S,G>,G extends Graph<N,E,S,G>>
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The graph display
    Author:
    Peter Macko
